description: Admin approval logic depends on the vendor registration process creating a user in a 'pending' state.
mitigation_plan: Develop features within the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Vendor onboarding flow will be blocked.

description: The search indexing pipeline requires product data to exist. The product creation feature must be in place before search can be fully implemented and tested.
mitigation_plan: Use mock product data for initial development of the search API while the product creation feature is being finalized.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire product discovery feature set.

description: The customer checkout UI for payment method selection needs the API to fetch the admin-configurable COD limit.
mitigation_plan: Frontend can develop with a hardcoded default value and integrate with the live API once ready.
impact_if_delayed: COD limit logic on the frontend will not be dynamic.
